text:
We booked Maxi-Cab services for a large group in Dec and from the planning to booking, the service was 10/10!
The driving service was amazing as well. Always on time, smooth rides and also provided recommendations on things to do as well how to plan out our already planned activities. Will highly recommend their service.
Thank you for giving my friends and I a memorable trip.
Cab arrived in time and driver is polite. Cab exterior condition is slightly dusty and aircon not cool when we board the cab.

Very nice arrnagement!  Vehicles were clean and nice,  as well as both drivers too.  We have reserved three trips during our stay and services were professional. Highly recommended to those who are looking for similar services
I have taken this wonderful service and found comfort and smooth journey in my travels. Price is so compatable and excellent condition of vehicle provided. ðŸ‘ŒðŸ‘Œ
Very efficient and prompt service. Top notch professionalism. Great job !
